main.name: Vijay Godhasara
main.bio: My name is Vijay Godhasara, and I'm a Senior Software Engineer currently working at Zextras Group. With over 13 years of experience in full-stack development, I have successfully delivered projects involving distributed systems. I excel in leadership, team management, adaptability, and problem-solving. My expertise lies in providing high-quality, robust solutions that consistently meet and exceed client expectations

education.school: LDRP Institute of Technology and Research

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: At Zextras Group, a technology company specializing in communication and collaboration solutions, I oversee development leadership, code review, integration, and QA builds. I facilitate daily scrum meetings and sprint activities, mentor team members, resolve dependencies, develop Admin Panel and Login UI components, define project structures, integrate modules, automate builds, implement TDD practices, deploy SonarQube for code quality, collaborate with the admin team on server setup and deployment, engage with project owners and stakeholders, optimize system performance and tracking, and prepare developer documentation. My efforts are dedicated to enhancing quality, productivity, and efficiency while ensuring clear requirements and stakeholder satisfaction.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: VNC India Pvt Ltd, a product-based company, entrusted me with conducting requirement analysis, designing and architecting products across web, desktop, and mobile platforms. I developed comprehensive test cases for quality assurance, led team management and development processes, conducted rigorous code reviews, orchestrated seamless integrations, and spearheaded project management using Redmine. I facilitated daily scrum meetings, actively participated in sprint activities, and implemented robust Single Sign-On solutions utilizing OpenAM, OpenDJ, and IDP-based Federation Services. Additionally, I innovated by designing and deploying a SAML plugin and connector in OpenIDM to streamline user provisioning. Furthermore, I contributed to enhancing workflow efficiency, bolstering security measures, optimizing user management processes, and ensuring punctual project deliveries through CI/CD pipeline implementations and release activities.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: At eInfochips, a service-based company, I contributed to multiple projects by conducting requirement analysis, designing and architecting solutions, collaborating with Cisco's technical team, implementing UI and business layers using various tools, working on distributed systems used by over 6000 customers, automating build and patch version processes, mentoring junior developers to ensure high-quality project delivery, and providing product support and maintenance.
